sentences.sContent: Personally, I think Adams’s collective work on homophobia is terribly important.
sentences.sContent_eng: Personally, I think Adams’s collective work on homophobia is terribly important.
sentences.sCn: 个人来说，我认为亚当斯关于同性恋憎恶的集体工作极其重要。

sentences.sContent: Over half of the participants admitted to taking out “red flag” words from their grant submission abstracts and titles, including the words needle-exchange, AIDS, homophobia, lesbian and gay.
sentences.sContent_eng: Over half of the participants admitted to taking out “red flag” words from their grant submission abstracts and titles, including the words needle-exchange, AIDS, homophobia, lesbian and gay.
sentences.sCn: 过半数受访者称将把“有危险的”语言从资金申请摘要和题目中抹去，包括针具交换，艾滋病，对同性恋的憎恶，同性恋者等词汇。

sentences.sContent: Many feminists claim that homophobia and ignorance are at the heart of people's refusal to label themselves as feminists, even though they agree with the tenets of feminism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many feminists claim that homophobia and ignorance are at the heart of people's refusal to label themselves as feminists, even though they agree with the tenets of feminism.
sentences.sCn: 许多女权主义者认为，对同性恋的厌恶与无知，在那些拒绝将自己归属为女权人士的心目中根深蒂固--即使他们认同女权主义的主张。
